name: Elf
short_desc: Created to watch over the surface.

lineages.name: Arcane
lineages.long_desc: Born of Aranou, attuned to & sensitive to the fluctuations of the Leylines.

lineages.name: Green
lineages.long_desc: Born of Arthera, attuned to nature. The Green Elves were made to watch over the bounds of the natural world.

name: Dwarf
short_desc: Rocky, rich in minerals. Created to watch over the underground.

name: Dragon
short_desc: Large, scaled & bewinged, mighty & temperamental. Amongst the oldest creatures walking the world.

name: Dragonborn
short_desc: Smaller & flightless but sturdy & as tempermental as their creators.

name: Aasimar
short_desc: Marble-skinned, winged, forged by divine hands, assistants to the Shards.
long_desc: The Aasimar are humanoid creatures forged by Hemos with a connection to the Font of Divinity from which their innate magics are derived. They were made to assist the Shards, travelling the world & ensuring it was safe from threats beyond & within.

lineages.name: Radiant
lineages.long_desc: The original state of the Aasimari, connected to the Font of Divinity. Though initially many, their numbers have dwindled to near extinction, being replaced by Humans. Rarely they are born or raised from humans.

lineages.name: Human
lineages.long_desc: Corrupted by time or their own doing, a number of Aasimar lost their connection to the Font of Divinity, losing their wings & becoming humans.

name: Birdfolk
long_desc: Created in 'cooperation' between Hemos & Loh, the Birdfolk are birdlike humanoids covered in feathers with clawed three pointed extremities.

lineages.name: Flying
lineages.long_desc: Born from Hemos' vision the Birdfolk had separated arms & wings, allowing them to glide but not propel themselves upward.

lineages.name: Flightless
lineages.long_desc: Changed from their original mold by Loh, arm & wing were fused together.

name: Goblin
short_desc: Green, Aquamarine, Thin, Wide, Tall, Short, *Long-eared*.
long_desc: Goblinoids are not truly a singular species, born from the alchemical Goblin Concoction, they are as twice as varied and twice as mad as most others. While typically small, green, and pointy-eared, their construction gives way to all manners of mutations & colourations.

lineages.name: Endless
lineages.long_desc: Owing to the unstable nature of their origins Goblin lineages are near impossible to categorize. Every tribe & individual may vary greatly from the next, depending on the exact ingredients of their making.

name: Gnome
long_desc: The origins of gnomes are veiled in mystery, though the more common theories include disagreements between Alai & Arum following the creation of dwarves. Following this gnomes were either Alai's own lineage without Arum's influence or her improved mold.

name: Halfling
long_desc: No one quite knows how or when Halflings arrived to the world. Their presence is a muted one, unnoticed by many.

lineages.name: Halfling
lineages.long_desc: No one quite knows where halflings came from.

name: Vampire
short_desc: Blood-drinking wanderers of the night, raised in undeath to serve the World-Eater.

name: Werewolf
short_desc: Changed by the full light of the Daughter, a curse of rage.
